Package org.texgen.textures.demo

Some demo textures from the how-to articles

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CloudTexture Composite texture made up of clouds laid over the sunset texture
Squares Texture demonstrating the demo using multiple transformed squares
SunsetTexture Uses a sunset color gradient to produce a horizontal sunset gradient
TigerColors Combines fur colors and a set of stripes to produce a tiger skin texture
UVSignalRotateTexture Demo texture indicating how we could use a signal source to drive the rotation value for a texture.
 

Package org.texgen.textures.demo Description
